Reviews.Title: A MUST HAVE!!!
Reviews.Author: JZ
Reviews.Content: If you are like me and HATE seeing power strips full of power supplies!! Get this! It runs everything! Plus I have it running LED's to jaz up my personal control center! And i still have extras to play with! I don't recommend hooking up your motum to it though, I still dont know what went wrong... But I fried my motum when I hooked it up $$$! I wired it up correctly, but I dont know how 1.2mA extra would hurt it, but it did??? But my security cameras seem to love it! My night vision LED's seem to be brighter now! I see the red eye's looking at me at night time clearly now!
